author: Joe Scott
description:
Compare news coverage. Spot media bias. Avoid algorithms. Try Ground News today and get 40% off your subscription by going to  https://ground.news/joescott

In today’s Lightning Round video, I talk about the AI bubble, the Rivian R2, YouTube monetization madness, tell a ghost story, and RocketLab’s Neutron rocket development.
